op_search_tip4.message: edit/add opration, double click a category tag and rename it

op_tip_fom_name.message: the name of search engine is necessary !

op_tip_fom_icon_timeout.message: get icon timeout, confirm the icon url is accessable !

op_tip_fom_pathkw.message: the keywords-ident is not matched with using path keywords !

op_tip_save_success.message: save success, it will take effect in new page or flush a opened page

op_tip_notallow.message: this operation is not allowed, because a search engine is being edited or added !

op_mtip_pos_right.message: tips: the search2 bar will be located left while it work below picture or video type for a good user experience

op_mtip_display_auto.message: display the search name smartly: when search2 bar is at left, it will show only search catagory name; when search2 bar is at top or bottom, it will show full search name

op_mtip_right_indentdistance.message: be effective only when search2 bar's position is at right

op_mtip_intervaldistance.message: when [tile search2 bar] is selected, this will not be effective

op_mtip_cartoon.message: a animation will show when click the [more] on search2 bar

op_mtip_borderline.message: put color on searchbar's border so that looks more beautiful

op_mtip_form_url.message: use %s replace the text keywords and %p replace the url address of a picture please

op_mtip_form_tf.message: some search engine identifies the search-type use url parameter, but not hostname, such as google, bing. you must input a typeflag here,for example: &tbm=isch, &tbm=web and so on

op_mtip_form_prkw.message: keywords-ident is the key-name of %s, for example: q=; you should input regex expression when [use path keywods] is checked, you can refer to the douyin search in the video type

op_mtip_form_enc.message: it's necessary only when the search engine is not supports utf-8 encoding. you can find the search engine's encoding with clicking: [chrome customize control menu]>[Tools]>[Encoding]

op_mtip_form_googleico.message:
Google provides a icon service for most of website, you can use it if you can't find the icon of search engine, the serviice url is: https://www.google.com/s2
/favicons?domain=website-domain. Note that you must have access to the Google icon service on your local computer to use this option

op_mtip_form_pathkw.message: this is a partiular option for compats few search engines, for example: https://www.douyin.com/search/%s；you should input regex expression in [keywords ident] if checked

oth_readme1.message: search2 follows four design principles: lightness, simplicity, ease of use, and scalability

oth_readme2.message: search2 does not introduce any third-party javascript libraries. It only loads on user-defined search engine pages

oth_readme3.message: search2 has extremely simple user interfaces, occupying only a small space on the page. It can even be hidden to the side to minimize interference with the user's original web experience

oth_readme4.message: search2 also adheres to Google's philosophy: a) user-centered, fully considering user habits; b) faster is better, with quick responses, as fast a web experience as possible; c) the web is fair and democratic, not bundling any search engines, including Google itself, and all search engines are fully customizable by users

oth_readme5.message: search2 requires a Chrome webkit version greater than 21 to function properly. Starting from version v2.0.0, it supports manifest v3

oth_readme6.message: The past mind is unattainable, The present mind is unattainable, The future mind is unattainable

oth_reset_confirm.message: you are reseting the configure to default, the previous config will be losed, you sure do it?

oth_tab_rm_confirm.message: you are removing this search category including all search engine in the category, you sure do it?
